       Rampage leaps on top of Demise, the fallen bot had just skid across 
the tundra from several of his shots. "Ah, I want to savor your fear...breath 
it in..." He says, and inhales deeply, seeming to get enjoyment out of the 
bots temporary pain. Rampage turns to his arm, once bloddy and bleeding, it 
is now frozen. At least he didnt have to worry about bleeding to death, the 
ice clot saved him from that.
       "And now, its time to end this playing." He said gruffly, raised his 
missle launcher, and fired point blank.

       Tankkor flipped three times, as far as he can remember. His right 
crawler was damaged so he transformed and turned once agian to Endbringer. 
More mech oozed its way out of his wounds and left silver puddles in the snow.
       No more marching, now he was going to get this bot. With a sting in 
his knee, he ran as fast as his large body could go and dove at Endbringer, 
vast arms extended to keep the bot at bay.

       Paralysis hears a thud. It must be Scather falling, finally. He points 
his wrist at a dent in the snow, and fires. THe black liquid was supposed to 
be his paralizing toxin, but due to the cold it's chemical compound wasnt 
going to be very effective. But, it would allow Paralysis to see the bot.
       As the liquid spry settled on the ground, he saw the faint outline of 
Scather lying on the snow.
       "Looks like we've evened the odds a bit!" Paralysis say, and with a 
left broken arm moves forward, now with pistol in hand, and begins a shoot 
out.
       Inferno buzzes around the air, sees now Scather who was once very 
invisable. "Ah ha! The invader!" He soars down and releases fireball after 
fireball.
       

--part1_64.9794a41.276e2252_boundary
